DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Placebo-Controlled , Double-blind Study Tianshu Capsule Treatment Migraine .
DOC.detailed_description: Primary headache disorder , particularly migraine globally prevalent . Many study show burden impose : pain , disability , reduce quality life ( QoL ) , mark impairment participation work social activity , heavy financial cost . The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy Tianshu capsule treat Migraine Headache . To provide safe effective treatment Migraine Headache .
DOC.criteria: Must meet Migraine diagnosis . Age onset age 50 year . Migraine must occur 1 year precede entry trial . The number migraine attack le 6 period 3 month prior Screening stage . The number migraine day 28 period 1 month prior screen entry trial . Migraine day less 15 period 1 month prior screen entry trial . Ages 1865 . Participant understand complete Headache diary . All participant sign informed consent . Other migraine prophylactic medication continue 3 month prior drug trial . Participants take Tianshu capsule 1 month prior Screening stage . The number acute treatment migraine 10 per month . Participants take antipsychotic antidepressant medication ( unless migraine prophylaxis ) previous 3 month . Participants abuse alcohol drug . Participants resistant acute migraine drug prescribe optimally . hypotension uncontrolled hypertension . Severe infection . Malignancy . Significant medical history cardiac disease , cerebrovascular disease , liver disease , nephropathy etc . Known allergies serious side effect Tianshu capsule past . Breastfeeding , pregnant potentially fertile woman participant . History cluster headache , tensiontype headache , vascular headache nonmigraine , drug dependence headache . Secondary headache , include hypertension , posttraumatic brain syndrome etc . Participants take migraine prophylactic medication regularly 1 month prior Screening stage . Participants take part clinical trial .
